title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: CLI and server to run Llama 2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with GPU/CPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM, chat, and embedding interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) to chat, manage models, and share conversations; runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library exposing synchronous & asynchronous APIs for every Ollama endpoint.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline coding assistants with autocomplete and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs and Markdown files.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models to any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama’s REST API with async HTTP, streaming chat, and native JSON mapping.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK supporting .NET 6+ and Unity; exposes chat, embed, and model management.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes, generate summaries, and brainstorm with templates.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Idiomatic Rust crate with Tokio-based async client, strong typing, and streaming iterator support.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama in GenServer processes for fault-tolerant chat and embedding inside Phoenix apps.

title: ollama-rag-langchain
summary: End-to-end repo showing how to combine Ollama embeddings, Chroma, and LangChain for PDF question-answering.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command and DM threads for chatting with local models securely.
